definition: thin piece of wood used a writing tablet (in ancient China)/a kind of official document (in former times)/letter/note/plague
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: This article was reading notes about Taixuan, the department of literature research.
sentences.chinese: 本文是一篇阅读《太玄》的读书札记，系文献研究。

sentences.english: So, welcome to the Gates Notes.
sentences.chinese: 所以欢迎来带盖茨札记。

definition: various notes or records/a miscellany/scattered jottings
to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]

notes on poetry, an essay genre consisting of informal commentary on poems and poets and their lives (old)/a genre of narrative literature interspersing prose with poetry, popular in the Tang and Song dynasties
author's preface/autobiographical notes as introduction to a book
